snippet: Concerns about a rise in interest rates and a dominant dollar led indexes downward, with the Dow Jones industrials and the S.&.P 500 wiping out the year’s gains.
abstract: Stocks fall sharply, erasing year's gains for the Down Jones industrial average and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index; decline reflects anxiety about expected interest rate hike and plunging euro.
lead_paragraph: Concerns about a rise in interest rates and a dominant dollar led indexes downward, with the Dow Jones industrials and the S.&.P 500 wiping out the year’s gains.

headline.main: A Strengthening Dollar Pummels U.S. Markets
headline.print_headline: A Strengthening Dollar Pummels U.S. Markets
